testcase.name: generateContent_lowBudget_throwsBudgetExceeded

failure.message: Real implementation must enforce budget limits. A $0.01 budget should not be enough to generate content. ==> Expected com.tenx.enterprise.exception.BudgetExceededException to be thrown, but nothing was thrown.
